Comments_List: Paul North and Willy Thayer were wonderful professors that mostly taught us how to read images and text in a fascinating critical manner.
No weaknesses, perhaps what we lacked was more time since all sessions were engaging, inspiring and left us wanting more time to learn more.
Yes. Because the critical  thinking that Paul and Willy engage with is truly deep.
